sections.title: vvid Hardware Group
sections.description: Guangdong Dongtai Hardware Group, an R&D and manufacturing facility, is a professional provider of functional hardware products including: concealed hinges, epoxy drawer slides, ball bearing slides, undermount slides, double-wall drawer systems, door lifting systems, sliding door systems and connecting fittings suited for cabinets and furniture in residential or commercial environments. Dongtai has outstanding advantages in technology, manufacturing power, quality management, marketing and sales:
